Detailed Description

ImageIO class handles Image file format input and output.

Currently the following formats are supported. Input: gif, tiff, geotiff, png Ouput: gif, tiff, geotiff(if input was a geotiff).

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual ImageIO::~ImageIO (  )  [inline, virtual]
 

Destructor for class.

All class memory is returned to system.

)  [virtual]
 

Determins all image metrics for a given grid.

Parameters:
grid_ptr   the grid for which metrics will be determined.
scene   the scenario object which has info about the grid.

Parameters:

temp   a reference to the input grid collection.
internal   the reference to the scenario object.

Parameters:

colortable   is the output colortable.
